meanings.definition: A large ship used for carrying bulk cargo.
meanings.sent1: The bulkers sailed across the ocean with tons of cargo.
meanings.sent2: The port was busy with several bulkers unloading goods.
meanings.sent3: The bulker groaned under the weight of all the cargo it carried.
meanings.sent4: The bulker was a giant floating warehouse, brimming with goods.
meanings.sent5: The image of the bulker filled with cargo stayed in his mind for days.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that bulks.
meanings.sent1: The bodybuilder was known as a bulker in the gym.
meanings.sent2: The elephant was a massive bulker among the other animals.
meanings.sent3: The bulker of the group always brought the most food to the potluck.
meanings.sent4: She was a bulker in the family, always eating the most at dinner.
meanings.sent5: The mountain stood tall and proud, a bulker among the hills.

meanings.definition: A type of weightlifting exercise that targets the muscles of the lower body.
meanings.sent1: He included bulkers in his workout routine to strengthen his legs.
meanings.sent2: The fitness trainer demonstrated how to do bulkers properly.
meanings.sent3: The bulker exercise made him feel like he was lifting a mountain.
meanings.sent4: She felt the burn in her thighs after completing a set of bulkers.
meanings.sent5: The bulkers workout left him feeling stronger and more energized.
